predicates.expanded: Used if an organizational insider was the result of the breach.
Used if result of breach was due to system or app misconfiguration
Used if result of breach was result of supply chain compromise
Used if result of breach was due to ransomware
Used if result of breach was due to social engineering attack on organization
Used if result of breach was due to unauthorized access to the data by a third party
Used if result of breach was due to malware infection of organizational systems
Used if weather was the cause of the data breach
Used if the cause was related to a physical break in of the organization by malicious actor
Used if the organization used the wrong physical mailing address which resulted in the wrong individuals having access to sensitive data
Used if the organization used the wrong email address which resulted in the wrong individuals having access to sensitive data
Used if an organizational device was stolen, but not the result of physical break in of organizational facilities
Used if result of breach is unknown, but a breach disclosure has been reported
Used if result of breach is due to some form of negligence (i.e. PHI data simply thrown in trash and not properly destroyed)

description: LabyrINTh Data Breach Classification (MISP taxonomies). No external reference.  Built based on analyst experience.
